PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1997-02621997-02-180,  CAN PORTS,  TC,  ,  , 
PrecisAuthority for the Vancouver Port Corporation to increase the amount of its works contract with Containerport Constructors for the construction of the DELTAPORT CONTAINER TERMINAL berths, to cover a cost overrun related to a 30 metre extension to the berth face to accommodate larger ships.
